page.title: 10St. George's Hospital
page.content: St. George's Hospital is in Blackshaw Road, Tooting.It is a large hospital and as well as treating patients it has an attached Medical School which trains medical students, teaching them to be doctors.St. George's Hospital was founded in 1733 at Hyde Park Corner in central London but is now being rebuilt in Tooting.In 1980 the Queen came and opened the new Medical School and the first part of the new hospital.The hospital has about 550 beds at present and another new block is being built which will provide for out-patients as well as containing the accident and emergency department and wards with 360 beds.
